text:
Hey everybody!

Manuel from Argentina here. Software engineer by day, working on a low-code/data-integration startup. I’ve been a coder for as long as I can remember, though I’ve had several heartbreaks with the field. But I always come back.

History of computing is one of my interests. Our forefathers had, IMHO, a better idea of the future than we have.

I live a parallel life as a musician. I upload some of my stuff to one of my websites (<https://musica.jazzido.com>)

text:
Hey Folks!

I'm <https://www.linkedin.com/in/jacolonwalker/|Jacolon Walker>. Been in the cyber security / infosec space for 15+ years.  From netsec analyst, security engineer, exploit developer, reverse engineer, director and CISO. Interested in all things challenging :smile: . I found this slack through an alumni network from an previous employer. As for interesting hobbies, gardening, cycling, playing, guitar and smoking some nice cigars and becoming a pro at evacuation preparedness giving the state of the fires that are happening here on the west coast. Happy to be joining in the community here
